channel.title: Ip ban isn't working
channel.description:
Ok well I have ip banned this kid because he is like 7 years old logging onto my server getting mad and btw he's asian. He's logging in as. "cummy dick" "cummy fingers" "cummy boots" Yeah well you get the point.... He's childish. Here is my runserver :
[tt][client-7-oblivion iv]: Action Button: 24075 Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 and spermy is signing onto server. and spermy failed to logon because their ip is banned. and spermy: character file not found. [client-3-happy asian]: npcIndex: 31 magicID: 1152 [client-4-and spermy]: Loading finished. Game saved for player and spermy ClientHandler: Client and spermy disconnected. Npc id =30 Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 50998. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 and spermy is signing onto server. and spermy failed to logon because their ip is banned. Did not save for and spermy ClientHandler: Client and spermy disconnected. [client-3-happy asian]: npcIndex: 31 magicID: 1152 [client-3-happy asian]: npcIndex: 31 magicID: 1152 Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 51002. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 and he is signing onto server. and he failed to logon because their ip is banned. and he: character file not found. and he: moreinfo file not found. Game saved for player _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected. Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 51003. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 and he is signing onto server. and he failed to logon because their ip is banned. and he: character file not found. [client-4-and he]: Loading finished. Game saved for player and he ClientHandler: Client and he disconnected. Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 51004. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 and he is signing onto server. and he failed to logon because their ip is banned. Did not save for and he ClientHandler: Client and he disconnected. [client-3-happy asian]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6384, size=2]: ]70 1E [ [client-3-happy asian]: Action Button: 24112 Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 51006. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 likes is signing onto server. likes failed to logon because their ip is banned. likes : character file not found. likes : moreinfo file not found. Game saved for player _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected. Npc id =33 Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 51007. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 likes is signing onto server. likes failed to logon because their ip is banned. likes : character file not found. [client-4-likes ]: Loading finished. [client-2-james 9261]: Text [0,0]: brb need whip Game saved for player likes ClientHandler: Client likes disconnected. Connection accepted from 206-248-153-148.dsl.teksavvy.com: 51009. Client type: high memory version UserId: 20406700 likes is signing onto server. likes failed to logon because their ip is banned. Did not save for likes ClientHandler: Client likes disconnected. [client-6-d s c i m y]: Text [0,0]: k [/tt]
Ok so yeah.......... I don't have a command I just copy it from char files and paste it in bannedips. Does any1 know how to fix this? Or have a working command and coding?

item.title: Ip ban isn't working
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:4, topic:181734”][quote author=The Prodigyscape link=topic=243293.msg2055992#msg2055992 date=1203151253]
Thankyou!
I got 100 errors though…
I’m sure I just missed a semi colon somewhere.
Ty for that link.
[/quote]Ehm well you got to read very carefully, they tell you how to work it too.[/quote]

Kai thanks.
If mod reads this you can lock now.
